chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m0 m1 : Map state) (s : state), (state_in_dta m0 s -> taille_1 s <= DTA_taille m0) -> (state_in_dta m1 s -> taille_1 s <= DTA_taille m1) -> state_in_dta (M2 state m0 m1) s -> taille_1 s <= DTA_taille (M2 state m0 m1)

Premises:
state_in_dta = fun (d : preDTA) (s : state) => exists a : ad, MapGet state d a = Some s : preDTA -> state -> Prop
state = Map prec_list : Set
M2 : forall A : Type, Map A -> Map A -> Map A
taille_1 = fix taille_1 (s : state) : nat := match s with | @M0 _ => 0 | @M1 _ _ y => taille_0 y | @M2 _ x y => Nat.max (taille_1 x) (taille_1 y) end : state -> nat
Inductive Map (A : Type) : Type := M0 : Map A | M1 : ad -> A -> Map A | M2 : Map A -> Map A -> Map A For Map: Argument scope is [type_scope] For M0: Argument scope is [type_scope] For M1: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _] For M2: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _]
DTA_taille = fix DTA_taille (d : preDTA) : nat := match d with | @M0 _ => 0 | @M1 _ _ y => taille_1 y | @M2 _ x y => Nat.max (DTA_taille x) (DTA_taille y) end : preDTA -> nat
borne_1_1 : forall (a : ad) (s' s : state), state_in_dta (M1 state a s') s -> taille_1 s <= DTA_taille (M1 state a s')
borne_1_0 : forall s : state, state_in_dta (M0 state) s -> taille_1 s <= DTA_taille (M0 state)
borne_0_2 : forall (m0 m1 : Map prec_list) (p : prec_list), (prec_in_state m0 p -> taille_0 p <= taille_1 m0) -> (prec_in_state m1 p -> taille_0 p <= taille_1 m1) -> prec_in_state (M2 prec_list m0 m1) p -> taille_0 p <= taille_1 (M2 prec_list m0 m1)
borne_0 : forall (s : state) (p : prec_list), prec_in_state s p -> taille_0 p <= taille_1 s
M2_eqmap_1 : forall (A : Type) (m0 m1 m2 m3 : Map A), eqmap A (M2 A m0 m1) (M2 A m2 m3) -> eqmap A m0 m2
MapDisjoint_M2 : forall (A B : Type) (m0 m1 : Map A) (m2 m3 : Map B), MapDisjoint A B m0 m2 -> MapDisjoint A B m1 m3 -> MapDisjoint A B (M2 A m0 m1) (M2 B m2 m3)
M2_eqmap_2 : forall (A : Type) (m0 m1 m2 m3 : Map A), eqmap A (M2 A m0 m1) (M2 A m2 m3) -> eqmap A m1 m3
MapDisjoint_M2_l : forall (A B : Type) (m0 m1 : Map A) (m2 m3 : Map B), MapDisjoint A B (M2 A m0 m1) (M2 B m2 m3) -> MapDisjoint A B m0 m2
MapDisjoint_M2_r : forall (A B : Type) (m0 m1 : Map A) (m2 m3 : Map B), MapDisjoint A B (M2 A m0 m1) (M2 B m2 m3) -> MapDisjoint A B m1 m3
state_in_dta_M0_false : forall s : state, ~ state_in_dta (M0 state) s
prec_in_dta = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) => exists (s : state) (a c : ad), MapGet state d a = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p : preDTA -> prec_list -> Prop
prec_in_state = fun (s : state) (p : prec_list) => exists c : ad, MapGet prec_list s c = Some p : state -> prec_list -> Prop
state_in_dta_diff = fun (d : preDTA) (s : state) (a : ad) => exists b : ad, MapGet state d b = Some s /\ a <> b : preDTA -> state -> ad -> Prop
prec_in_dta_diff = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (a : ad) => exists (s : state) (b c : ad), MapGet state d b = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p /\ a <> b : preDTA -> prec_list -> ad -> Prop
prec_in_dta_cont = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) => exists (s : state) (b c : ad) (p0 : prec_list), MapGet state d b = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p0 /\ prec_contained p p0 : preDTA -> prec_list -> Prop
in_M2_disj : forall (A : Set) (a : A) (m0 m1 : Map A), (exists c : ad, MapGet A (M2 A m0 m1) c = Some a) -> (exists c : ad, MapGet A m0 c = Some a) \/ (exists c : ad, MapGet A m1 c = Some a)
prec_in_dta_diff_cont = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (a : ad) => exists (s : state) (b c : ad) (p0 : prec_list), MapGet state d b = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p0 /\ prec_contained p p0 /\ a <> b : preDTA -> prec_list -> ad -> Prop
sumbool_ind : forall (A B : Prop) (P : {A} + {B} -> Prop), (forall a : A, P (left a)) -> (forall b : B, P (right b)) -> forall s : {A} + {B}, P s
sumor_ind : forall (A : Type) (B : Prop) (P : A + {B} -> Prop), (forall a : A, P (inleft a)) -> (forall b : B, P (inright b)) -> forall s : A + {B}, P s
sig_rec : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (P0 : {x : A | P x} -> Set), (forall (x : A) (p : P x), P0 (exist P x p)) -> forall s : {x : A | P x}, P0 s
sig_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (P0 : {x : A | P x} -> Prop), (forall (x : A) (p : P x), P0 (exist P x p)) -> forall s : {x : A | P x}, P0 s
M2_canon : forall (A : Type) (m1 m2 : Map A), mapcanon A m1 -> mapcanon A m2 -> 2 <= MapCard A (M2 A m1 m2) -> mapcanon A (M2 A m1 m2)
mapcanon_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : Map A -> Prop), P (M0 A) -> (forall (a : ad) (y : A), P (M1 A a y)) -> (forall m1 m2 : Map A, mapcanon A m1 -> P m1 -> mapcanon A m2 -> P m2 -> 2 <= MapCard A (M2 A m1 m2) -> P (M2 A m1 m2)) -> forall m : Map A, mapcanon A m -> P m
Map_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : Map A -> Prop), P (M0 A) -> (forall (a : ad) (a0 : A), P (M1 A a a0)) -> (forall m : Map A, P m -> forall m0 : Map A, P m0 -> P (M2 A m m0)) -> forall m : Map A, P m
Map_rec : forall (A : Type) (P : Map A -> Set), P (M0 A) -> (forall (a : ad) (a0 : A), P (M1 A a a0)) -> (forall m : Map A, P m -> forall m0 : Map A, P m0 -> P (M2 A m m0)) -> forall m : Map A, P m

```coq
intros m0 m1 s H1 H2 H3.
induction m0; induction m1.
- simpl in *. intros. elimtype False. apply state_in_dta_M0_false. assumption.
- simpl in *. intros. apply borne_1_1. assumption.
- simpl in *. intros. apply borne_1_1. assumption.
- simpl in *. intros. 
  + apply H1. assumption.
  + apply H2. assumption.
  + destruct H3 as [a Ha]. destruct Ha as [s' [Ha1 Ha2]].
    rewrite <- (M2_eqmap_1 _ _ _ _ Ha1) in *. 
    rewrite <- (M2_eqmap_2 _ _ _ _ Ha1) in *. 
    specialize (IHm0 _ _ H1 H2 Ha2).
    specialize (IHm1 _ _ H1 H2 Ha2).
    apply Nat.max_le_compat. assumption. assumption.
Qed.
```

original: intros m0 m1 s H1 H2 H3. induction m0; induction m1. - simpl in *. intros. elimtype False. apply state_in_dta_M0_false. auto. - simpl in *. intros. apply borne_1_1. auto. - simpl in *. intros. apply borne_1_1. auto. - simpl in *. intros. + apply H1. auto. + apply H2. auto. + destruct H3 as [a Ha]. destruct Ha as [s' [Ha1 Ha2]]. rewrite <- (M2_eqmap_1 _ _ _ _ Ha1) in *. rewrite <- (M2_eqmap_2 _ _ _ _ Ha1) in *. specialize (IHm0 _ _ H1 H2 Ha2). specialize (IHm1 _ _ H1 H2 Ha2). apply Nat.max_le_compat. auto. auto.
